name: Cavern Climber
description:
Most Recent build in web player!

Originally for Ludum Dare 34!

CAVERN CLIMBER!

Jump from ledge to ledge for as long as you can to escape the growing pit of lava below you! Sometimes you'll lose your grip, sometimes there just won't be a ledge to grab. Don't fall!

Controls:

Direction:
Up/Left/Right

W/A/D

Jump: Down/S

Grab Ledge: Release Jump

Pause/Exit = Esc/Start Button

Made by Christian Smith

Game made in Unity

Art Made In Photoshop

Sound made on http://www.bfxr.net/

Ludum Dare Page

Follow me on twitter @fashionbatman
